plot: Once we have a dream, we have a very short time to register it at the dream registration company. After that, they will erase it. Too many dreams get lost like this. But, there is another way to remember and keep the dreams.
title: Remember My Dream
plot_es: Once we have a dream, we have a very short time to register it at the dream registration company. After that, they will erase it. Too many dreams get lost like this. But, there is another way to remember and keep the dreams.
plot_en: Once we have a dream, we have a very short time to register it at the dream registration company. After that, they will erase it. Too many dreams get lost like this. But, there is another way to remember and keep the dreams.
